title: Banned?

replies.body: Insulting people in Mandarin is still insulting people.

That is enough to get a restriction more or less at any point in the history of the game. Tons of totally useless/flaming chat spam.

If it does not help the team or is going to distract team members/make them play worse, it does not need to be said.

Dang.  Pretty frustrating this Talon who says "I am inting" and runs down mid this game does not get punished but people who talk smack do...
Very frustrating.  
I have had 2 week ban on this account so I guess it's time to move onto account #15.  
I've never heard of a video game company banning people for what they say in chat and being so indifferent to hackers and griefers who intentionally feed/troll and ruin the game for others.
{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}  Hoping the SJW idiots who design this player behavior shit burn in hell {{summoner:14}}  {{summoner:14}}

> [{quoted}](name=execute n00bs,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ELr5eKBE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-02-13T01:58:11.753+0000)
>
> Dang.  Pretty frustrating this Talon who says "I am inting" and runs down mid this game does not get punished but people who talk smack do...
> Very frustrating.  
> I have had 2 week ban on this account so I guess it's time to move onto account #15.  
> I've never heard of a video game company banning people for what they say in chat and being so indifferent to hackers and griefers who intentionally feed/troll and ruin the game for others.
> {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}  Hoping the SJW idiots who design this player behavior shit burn in hell {{summoner:14}}  {{summoner:14}}

You dont get a notification of punishment unless someone is gotten by the automated system right after your report.

As you can see from watching here, they do eventually get them.

I have gotten notifications after I reported people for saying the N word.  I only reported them because they were also inters/made the game unwinnable.  
I have reported DOZENS of people for inting - followed up on their op.gg and they are still playing the game months later.
The automated system fails to detect intentional feeders and Riot spends tons of resources and $ detecting what people say - not what they do.

> [{quoted}](name=execute n00bs,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ELr5eKBE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-02-13T01:58:11.753+0000)

wow making another account on a free to play game to get it banned again have fun feeling accomplished
Yes. Anything that is punishable will eventually lead to a punishment if you do it often enough.
Have you had prior punishments on this account?
